Class TextObject

extends java.lang.Object

        public static void setSettings​(GameSettings settings)
        WARNING: Do not call this method. It is only to be called by core library classes.
        Sets the settings of the render engine. Once a value is defined, it cannot be changed.
        Parameters:
        settings - the game settings
